name: power
description:
The power command extracts electrical infrastructure from OSM data including:

- Power lines with voltage and length calculations
- Substations
- Generators (wind, solar, hydro, etc.)
- Towers and poles

Useful for energy infrastructure mapping and analysis.

options.--type: Power feature type: line, substation, generator, tower, pole, all (default: all)
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Power infrastructure with:
- power: Feature type (line, substation, etc.)
- name: Feature name
- operator: Power company
- voltage: Voltage in volts
- cables: Number of cables (for lines)
- source: Energy source (for generators)
- length_m: Line length in meters
- Geometry: Point or LineString
